messages.subject: Re: 2259 - strip the land
messages.msgSnippet: on 8/18/02 1:41 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at ... Or maybe they were following the Biblical command to dominate the Earth. The government strips
messages.messageBody:
on 8/18/02 1:41 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> Also the 5 forests I know of are owned by 3 neighbors. They chose to
> strip the land for money. Not b/c of hardships but because they
> wanted new things. A new yacht. A huge new house. Other examples.
> With no regard to the land or animals.

Or maybe they were following the Biblical command to dominate the Earth.
The government strips the land all day, every day.

Ned Vare
It takes government to make a war. Today, I read in the paper that NO
national politicians are talking about peace. I find that strange, indeed.
